title: Double Wide Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Grill food with vegetarian and vegan items marked on the menu. Includes BBQ seitan wings, BBQ pulled seitan sandwich, vegan chili, tempeh veg-sausage, potato tacos, wood grilled veggies, Caribbean coconut tofu, and more. Has kids menu. Large beer selection. Located in a retro style service station with some hillbilly flare. Another location in Pittsburgh.
